moduleMeta.name: Temp1sta
moduleMeta.author: hzfwhy@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: Temperature distribution. Distributes temperatures to HRU's using temperature data measured at a stationand a monthly parameter based on the lapse rate with elevation.

var.name: basin_tsta
var.description: Index of main temperature station Index of temperature station used to compute basin temperature values

var.name: hru_tsta
var.description: Index of the base temperature station used for lapse rate calculations

var.name: tmax_adj
var.description: Adjustment to maximum temperature for each HRU, estimated based on slope and aspect

var.name: tmin_adj
var.description: Adjustment to minimum temperature for each HRU, estimated based on slope and aspect

var.name: tmax_lapse
var.description: rray of twelve values representing the change in maximum temperature per 1000 elev_units of elevation change for each month, January to December

var.name: tmin_lapse
var.description: Array of twelve values representing the change in minimum temperture per 1000 elev_units of elevation change for each month, January to December

var.name: tsta_elev
var.description: Elevation of each temperature measurement station

var.name: basin_area_inv
var.description: Inverse of total basin area as sum of HRU areas

var.name: solrad_tmax
var.description: Basin daily maximum temperature adjusted to elevation of solar radiation station

var.name: starttime
var.description: Basin daily minimum temperature for use with solrad radiation
